text: Survivor Series (2004) was a professional wrestling pay-per-view show made by World Wrestling Entertainment (WWE). It took place on November 14, 2004 at the Gund Arena in Cleveland, Ohio. It was the 18th Survivor Series event held by WWE. The main event match for the Raw brand was a 4 on 4 Survivor Series match, where Team Orton (Randy Orton, Chris Benoit, Chris Jericho, and Maven) defeated Team Triple H (Triple H, Edge, Batista, and Gene Snitsky). In the main match for SmackDown!, John "Bradshaw" Layfield (JBL) defeated Booker T to keep his WWE Championship. ==Matches== No. Results Stipulations Times 1 La Résistance (Sylvain Grenier and Robért Conway) (c) defeated Rosey and The Hurricane Tag team match for the World Tag Team Championship 4:59 2 Spike Dudley (c) defeated Billy Kidman, Chavo Guerrero, and Rey Mysterio Fatal Four- Way match for the WWE Cruiserweight Championship 9:09 3 Shelton Benjamin (c) defeated Christian (with Tyson Tomko) Singles match for the WWE Intercontinental Championship 13:23 4 Team Guerrero (Eddie Guerrero, Big Show, Rob Van Dam, and John Cena) defeated Team Angle (Kurt Angle, Carlito Caribbean Cool, Luther Reigns and Mark Jindrak) (with Jesús) Four-on-four Survivor Series elimination match 12:26 5 The Undertaker defeated Heidenreich (with Paul Heyman) Singles match 15:58 6 Trish Stratus (c) defeated Lita by disqualification Singles match for the WWE Women's Championship 1:24 7 John "Bradshaw" Layfield (c) (with Orlando Jordan) defeated Booker T Singles match for the WWE Championship 14:43 8 Team Orton (Randy Orton, Chris Benoit, Chris Jericho, and Maven) defeated Team Triple H (Triple H, Edge, Batista, and Snitsky) (with Ric Flair) Four-on-four Survivor Series elimination match 24:31 === Survivor Series elimination matches === ==== SmackDown!
